description:
Play and learn how to count - simple game for toddlers and preschoolers! This is a simple counting game for children. Learning to count has never been so easy and fun!
4 beautiful shops - it is a great opportunity to learn numbers!

FEATURES:
* Great way to play a virtual store!
* Play & practice counting!
* Simple controls - tap and drag items.
* Fill your virtual shopping cart, put your products on a desk and pay with virtual coins!
* No risk - no ads!
name: Little Shopping
